Class RegularGoblin

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.entity.Entity
com.goblinskeep.entity.Goblin
com.goblinskeep.entity.RegularGoblin
public class RegularGoblin extends Goblin
Represents a regular goblin entity that can move randomly or follow a path.
